      • hasChanged

        public java.lang.Boolean hasChanged()
        Checks if the displayed text has been changed.
        Returns:
        true if it has changed, else false.

        Gets the index of this line (The score on the scoreboard).
        Returns:
        The line's index.

        Returns:

      • getPreviousText

        public java.lang.String getPreviousText()
        Gets the next before the last change.
        Returns:
        The previously displayed text.

      • setCurrentText

        public void setCurrentText(java.lang.String _newText)
        Sets the text currently being displayed. This has no effect on the actual scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        _newText - The text to display.
